LanguageData.SoilRich.label: rich soil
LanguageData.SoilRich.description: Soil that has been enriched with Fertilizer to improve crop growth. Fertility: 150%。
LanguageData.Sand.label: sand
LanguageData.Sand.description: Sand is finely divided rock and mineral particles. Naturally found on beaches and deserts. Beauty: -1。
LanguageData.Mud.label: mud
LanguageData.Marsh.label: marsh
LanguageData.Gravel.label: gravel
LanguageData.Gravel.description: Gravel is a composition of small rocks of varying sizes. Rubble can be gathered from it. Beauty: -1。
